instructions:
Simmer carrots about 4 to 6 minutes to fork tender *(not soft)* and drain. Mix remaining ingredients and
add carrots. Marinate in the refrigerator. Will keep 1 month under refrigeration. 
*(Rev. 5/7/96)*
ingredients: 3 cups carrots (8 or 9 medium), sliced 1/8 inch
3/4 cup sweet onion, sliced 1/4 inch and quartered
1/2 cup green (or red) pepper, chopped 1/4 inch
name: Marinated Carrots
creator: Jan Decker
